basics.name: Nadir Hussain Laskar
basics.title: Software Development Team Lead
basics.bio: A creative entrepreneurial developer with expertise in AI, Blockchain, Web, VR/AR, and Full-stack development. Currently leading development of low code platform with voice interface.

projects.title: ReactJS Components Library
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive components library in ReactJS to streamline development process and improve code reusability across projects.

projects.title: Low Code Platform with Voice Interface
projects.description: Leading the development of an innovative low code platform that incorporates voice interface for enhanced user interaction and productivity.

projects.title: Micro-Frontend Architecture
projects.description: Implemented a micro-frontend architecture using Single SPA framework to create more maintainable and scalable web applications.

experience.description: Leading the development of a low code platform with voice interface, managing team of developers, and implementing micro-frontend architecture using Single SPA.
Developed full-stack web applications using ReactJS, NodeJS, and AWS services. Created reusable component libraries and implemented best practices for code quality.
